import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { getLocal } from '../../helpers/auth' import { useActionData, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Login from '../login/Login' import jwtDecode from 'jwt-decode' import axios from 'axios' import { baseUrl } from '../../api/api' function UserProfile() { const history = useNavigate() const [user, setUser] = useState('') const response = getLocal(); const decoded = jwtDecode(response) async function getUser() { const response = await fetch(`${baseUrl}user-detail/${decoded.user_id}/`, { method: 'PUT', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({ }) }) } const UserUpdate = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() async function updateUser() { const user = await axios.put(`${baseUrl}user-detail/${decoded.user_id}/`).then(res => { console.log(user); }) } const closeButton = document.querySelector('.btn-secondary[data-bs-dismiss="modal"]'); closeButton.click(); } useEffect(() => { if (!response) { history('/') } getUser() }, []) return (
{user?.username}
Information
Email

{user?.email}

Phone

123 456 789

Update Profile

) } export default UserProfile
